headline: Bring back my lost Children
headline_detail: To open their eyes, so that they may turn from darkness to light and from the power of Satan to God, that they may receive forgiveness of sins and a place among those who are sanctified by faith in me. (Acts 26:18)
mission_detail: Our mission is to train Street People reborn in the Lord as missionaries and to cultivate missionaries who can help native North American regions and countries and peoples where the gospel is withering.

support.title: Support us
support.detail: Help us get the Street People back
